meanings.definition: A substance obtained by the process of raffination.
meanings.sent1: The raffinate was the purest form of the material after raffination.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the raffinate under a microscope to analyze its properties.
meanings.sent3: The raffinate decided to throw a party to celebrate its purity.
meanings.sent4: The raffinate stood out like a diamond in a sea of impurities.
meanings.sent5: The raffinate sparkled with clarity, a result of the meticulous raffination process.

meanings.definition: To refine or purify a substance by the process of raffination.
meanings.sent1: She raffinated the oil to remove any impurities before using it in the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The factory workers raffinate the raw material to ensure high-quality production.
meanings.sent3: The chef raffinated the ingredients with precision, like a culinary artist.
meanings.sent4: His words were raffinated through experience, like a fine wine aged to perfection.
meanings.sent5: The jeweler raffinated the gold, transforming it into a gleaming masterpiece.
